alert.note: Alert for Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN GALVESTON...EAST CENTRAL FORT BEND...NORTHEASTERN BRAZORIA AND SOUTHEASTERN HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 544 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lake Houston Dam to Pasadena to Fresno. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, Pearland, League City, Baytown, Missouri City, Texas City, Friendswood, La Porte, Deer Park, Alvin, Dickinson, Stafford, South Houston, Bellaire, West University Place, Seabrook, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Webster, and Manvel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris
